abstract: A criminal investigation into the marketing of one product is expanding, and regulators have rejected another product in one of Medtronic’s most profitable divisions.
snippet: A criminal investigation into the marketing of one product is expanding, and regulators have rejected another product in one of Medtronic’s most profitable divisions.
lead_paragraph: One of Medtronic’s most profitable divisions — selling bone growth products used in spinal fusion procedures — faces growing pressure amid a widening criminal investigation into the company’s marketing of one product and a rejection by federal regulators of another one.

byline.original: By Barry Meier and Duff Wilson
